702145f-a.title: Bronx: White Plains Road - Lydig Avenue
702145f-a.text:
White Plains Road, east side, between Lydig Ave. and Pelham Park.
way South, showing the ruin of an old stone house on the former John
Jacob Astor estate.
July 28, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
